samples.description: Demo scene and other assets for hand-tracking integration with VR Builder and the XR Interaction Toolkit. Dependencies: • XR Hands • Shader Graph • XRI Starter Assets sample • XRI Hands Interaction Demo sample

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- Updated the default rig to match the XRI Toolkit `3.1.2` rig.
- Added tunneling vignette option to the default rig.
- Added animated hands option to the default rig.

### Fixed
- Fixed exception in WebGL mode.
- Fixed API break related to `LockOnParentObjectLock`.
